analysis.description:
Reentrancy in ZUR.claimToken (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#476-490):
	External calls:
	- payment = getUnclaimedTokenAmount(_tokenAddr,_payee) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#481-482)
	- require(bool)(Token.balanceOf(address(this)) >= payment) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#485)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensReleased (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#485-487)
	- totalTokensReleased (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#487-488)

Reentrancy in ZUR.unTrackToken (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol):
	External calls:
	- ERC20(_addr).transfer(_addr,ERC20(_addr).balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- trackedTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol)
	- trackedTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol)
	- trackedTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol)

ZUR.claimToken (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#476-490) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-Token.transfer(_payee,payment) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#488-489)

ZUR.addPayee (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#573-579) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(this).mint(_payee,_cheques) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#579)

ZUR.finishedLoading (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#580-581) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-MintableToken(this).finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol#581)

ZUR.unTrackToken (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20(_addr).transfer(_addr,ERC20(_addr).balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf224706834749da2165743614db339a97f3e3244.sol)
